name: OverlayPanel
description: OverlayPanel, also known as Popover, is a container component that can overlay other components on page.

dismissable.label: dismissable
dismissable.title: Enables to hide the overlay when outside is clicked.

show-close-icon.label: showCloseIcon
show-close-icon.title: When enabled, displays a close icon at top right corner.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

breakpoints.label: breakpoints
breakpoints.title: Object literal to define widths per screen size.

close-icon.label: closeIcon
close-icon.title: Icon to display in the overlaypanel close button.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

close-on-escape.label: closeOnEscape
close-on-escape.title: Specifies if pressing escape key should hide the dialog.
